definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: We took a hovercraft across the English Channel.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘气垫船横渡英吉利海峡。

sentences.english: I often swam across the river.
John is go to took a voyage through the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 约翰打算作一次横渡太平洋的舴航行。

sentences.english: Ferry lines across the Huangpu River will be completed within three months.
sentences.chinese: 三个月后还将开辟横渡黄浦江的渡轮线。

sentences.english: I often swim across the river.
I wish you a pleasant crossing on the car ferry " prince albert".
sentences.chinese: 祝大家乘坐爱伯特王子号载车渡船横渡愉快。

sentences.english: I can hardly imagine Peter(Peter’s) sailing across the Atlantic Ocean in five days.
sentences.chinese: 我简直不能想象彼得会在五天内横渡大西洋。

sentences.english: John is going to take a voyage across the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 约翰打算作一次横渡太平洋的舴航行。

sentences.english: The girl kept in training all the year round in the hope of swimming the English Channel in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 那女子常年坚持训练，希望能在夏季横渡英吉利海峡。

sentences.english: It was through the power of his mind that Hanuman leapt over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 哈曼奴也是通常心智的力量去横渡海洋。

sentences.english: Debbi Hart is going to swim across the English Channel tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 黛比哈特明天打算游泳横渡英吉利海峡。

sentences.english: Erna Hart is going to swim across the English Channel tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 哈特准备明天游泳横渡英吉利海峡。

sentences.english: Zhenghe and his men made seven crossings on the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 郑和和他的手下人七次横渡印度洋。

sentences.english: What did Jane do when she and her family were travelling across the Channel?
sentences.chinese: 当简和她的家人在横渡英吉利海峡时简做了什么？
你们横渡大洋，跨越千山万水。

sentences.english: Smoothly animated fish swim across your desktop in a life-like manner.
sentences.chinese: 顺利动画鱼横渡你的桌面生活风度。

definition: to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
opposite bank (of a body of water)
